divs: Sighting DetailsWe were sitting at the terrace at twilight, the Sun was just down and not visible anymore but the light was still projecting to the sky when 2 stars like objects appear at the right site traveling to the left at an incredible speed. They were flying very closed to each other one behind the other. I would say that they crossed the sky in 4 to 5 seconds leaving no sound no vapor tail��� it was very impressive.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Malaga
There were no other sightings in Malaga on or around July 28th 2009
